quote: Just like your father, Ryan—blunt, abrasive and cursing like a sailor.” He moved closer until he was just inches from him and added with a wink, “Everything I liked about him.
quote_letters: JUST LIKE YOUR FATHER RYAN-BLUNT ABRASIVE AND CURSING LIKE A SAILOR HE MOVED CLOSER UNTIL HE WAS JUST INCHES FROM HIM AND ADDED WITH A WINK EVERYTHING I LIKED ABOUT HIM
